ChunkText: we are required by law to verify your full-time enrollment each semester, and will need to be able to report how many credits you are taking at another school to make sure that, combined with your umbc courses, you meet the minimum full-time requirements.
ContextBefore: please note that if you will take some credits at another school during a semester, you will need to provide isss with a copy of your course schedule.
ContextAfter: if while applying to the other school, you need a letter or email of permission from our office, please email isss@umbc.edu to let us know and we will be happy to provide the required permission.
